Headline

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec hendrerit sodles magna. In posuere sem lacus, ac volutpat purus cone nec. Pellentesque bibendum ex id massa bib endum hendrerit a at nunc. Fusce malesuada purus urna, vitae gravida ex pellentesque vel.

Click here to see all stories
 

The value of BluePoints is subject to taxation and/or payroll reporting in most countries similar to regular compensation and other recognition awards. Tax assistance will be provided for all BluePoint deposits in all countries. The value of the BluePoints will be included in your taxable income, but IBM will compensate you for those taxes. This should neutralize the impact in your net pay caused by the taxation of the BluePoints. Your country’s payroll group will be provided the BluePoints value and will process it based on your country’s taxation schedule (typically 30-45 days after issuance).

Click here to access the IBM Recognition Center.
